data: Ek samay ki baat hai, ek chyunta (fox) jungle mein rahta tha. Woh bahut chalak aur tej tha. Ek din, usne ek angur ke khet mein jaakar angur churane ki koshish ki. Lekin uski pahunch angur tak nahin ho saki. Bahut koshish karne ke baad bhi, woh angur nahin tod saka. Phir usne socha, 'Angur kharaab hoga, isliye mainein use chhod diya.'
